title: Conscious Geek Stuff
shortDescription: T-shirts and apparel for the contemporary geek.
longDescription: Conscious Geek Stuff is the crossing point of computer science, digital art (specialty pixel art), old and new science, the ways of Earth and Consciousness.

title: Human Beyond Labs
shortDescription: Creative studio that focuses on interactive storytelling through immersive installations using AI.
longDescription: We explore the intersection of cutting edge technology and human expression; combining web technologies, artificial intelligence, and digital art.

title: Tamagotchi Instagram
shortDescription: An Instagram scraper to collect publicly available data.
longDescription: Tamagotchi is based on Puppeteer, a library that leverage Chrome Dev Tools. By interacting with Instagram as a human user it can navigate content without limitations and extract the publicly available data in a structured way, ready to be analyzed.

title: Adventures of the Valparaiso
shortDescription: Art studio above the hull of a hundre-years-old barge.
longDescription: Adventures of the Valparaiso is a journey along the road to paradise. The fuel that keeps this ship and its projects going is the inspiration of the old port city it is named after and the sign you see in the window when you first step on board that reads. Happiness is the journey not the destination

title: Tamagotchi Facebook
shortDescription: A Facebook scraper to collect publicly available data.
longDescription: Tamagotchi is based on Puppeteer, a library that leverage Chrome Dev Tools. By interacting with Facebook UI as a human user it can navigate content without limitations and extract the publicly available data in a structured way, ready to be analyzed.

title: Tamagotchi Dashboard
shortDescription: Intuitive administration dashboard to manage & monitor microservice-based applications using REST APIs.
longDescription: The dashboard is built as a progressive web app. It implements JWT for authentication. The UI components are based on Google Material Design to ensure good practices on usability and UX.

title: Singularity Instant
shortDescription: A short piece of interactive contemporary art.
longDescription: Presented as an immersive scene that includes interactive components of dance, music, olfactory art and reactive image design.

title: Singularity Horizon
shortDescription: An interactive contemporary dance piece in seven acts.
longDescription: Set in a multisensory landscape where music, dance, fragrances and interactive projections stimulate the imagination.
